name: Flutter VR
description:
Explore the beauty of the rainforest as you discover real life butterfly species and meet animal friends in this relaxing game.

Over five days, see the environment change from day to night and rain to sunshine as you meet and discover new creatures. Unlock journal entries by documenting species and uncovering hidden secrets! Photograph each new find and immerse yourself in the wondrous world of the rainforest!

Made by Runaway, creating games inspired by nature full of real world creatures. With over 5 million downloads of their 4.5 star rated mobile games Flutter: Butterfly Sanctuary, Flutter: Starlight and Splash: Ocean Sanctuary!

FEATURES
- Escape to the rainforest from the comfort of your own home with Google Daydream.
- Five unique days with day and night changes to both the environment and creatures, including different weather!
- Your goal is to discover 15 real life species of magical moths and beautiful butterflies
- Record the adventure in your journal with photographs, taken by YOU!
- Unlock cute sketches, illustrations and facts with each new discovery about your butterfly friends and surroundings.
- Relax and enjoy the beauty of nature with ambient rainforest sounds and soundtrack.
